content:
780 
 
    (xiii) JABU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes including 
English Language, Literature in English and a minimum of 
‘O’ level pass in Mathematics  
(xiv) AUE requires ‘O’ level credit passes in at least six (6) 
subjects, including English Language, Literature in En glish 
and Mathematics obtained at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
(xv) DELSU requires ‘O’ level credit passes to include English 
Language, Mathematics and two (2) other subjects from 
Economics, Government, Geography, Commerce and 
Government.  
(xvi) ABUAD for Media and Communication Studies requires ‘O’ 
level credit pass in Mathematics.  
(xvii) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and 
any two (2) of Economics, History/Government, 
Geography, any Nigerian Language, Christian Religious 
Studies/Islamic Studies and Civic Education.  
(xviii) KSU requires five (5) credit passes at SSC or equivalent in 
English Language, Literature in English, Mathematics and 
any other two (2) Arts and or Social Science subjects.  
(xix) CUAB 'O' level credit pass in Literature in English will be an 
added advantage.  
(xx) SOUTHWESTERN requires 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Literature in English and Government 
plus ‘O’ level pass in Mathematics.  
(xxi) WESTERN-DEL a ccept five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language, Literature in English, 
Government and any other relevant subjects.  
(xxii) MOUNTAIN TOP requires ‘O’ level credit pass to include 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and 
any other two (2) subjects.  
(xxiii) PLASU requires credit passin 'O' level Literature in English 
in addition to the UTME requirements.  
(xxiv) PAN-ATLANTIC requires five (5) SSC credit passes to include 
English Language, Literature in English and Government.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (i)  LAGOS, AUE and BOWEN require Literature in English.  
LAGOS also accepts Mathematics as UTME subject.
